        Description copied from interface: TargetNodeToBuildRuleTransformer
        Converts a given TargetNode to a BuildRule as part of action graph construction. The providers computed from LegacyProviderCompatibleDescription.createProviders(ProviderCreationContext, BuildTarget, BuildRuleArg) will be passed to this function to be used to construct the BuildRule
        Specified by:
        transform in interface TargetNodeToBuildRuleTransformer
